sentences.en: After hiking all day we finally reached the uppermost part of the mountain.
sentences.cn: 徒步走了一整天,我们终于爬到了山顶.

sentences.en: He says whatever is uppermost in his mind.
sentences.cn: 他说出他心里最牵挂的事.

sentences.en: In the car she reverted to the subject uppermost in her mind.
sentences.cn: 在车里，她又提起了她最关心的话题。

sentences.en: John was on the uppermost floor of the three-storey gatehouse.
sentences.cn: 约翰在三层门房的最高层。

sentences.en: Keep this explanation uppermost in your mind.
Lastly comes the question which is uppermost in most minds, the most treacherous question of all—that of retaliation.
sentences.cn: 最后一个问题是在所有被关心问题中最重要的，也是最危险的——关于报复的问题。

sentences.en: Lift the fish and carefully place it on a large board, flat side uppermost.
sentences.cn: 拿起鱼，小心地放在一块平放的大板上。

sentences.en: Oliver Twist being uppermost in his mind, he made him his theme.
sentences.cn: 他最先想到是奥立弗·退斯特, 便拿来作为话题.

sentences.en: President Lee says the economic benefits of that agreement were uppermost in his mind when he made the beef deal.
sentences.cn: 李明博说，他决定这项自由贸易协议时，该协议的经济利益在他心中是最重要的。

sentences.en: Protection of sites, habitats and landscapes is of uppermost priority.
sentences.cn: 保护遗址、栖息地和风景区是重中之重。

sentences.en: She placed her hands palm uppermost in her lap.
sentences.cn: 她把手掌心向上放在大腿上。

sentences.en: Such mental conflict was not always uppermost.
sentences.cn: 这种思想斗争并非时时浮上心头.

sentences.en: The children's education is the teacher's uppermost concern.
sentences.cn: 孩子的教育是教师所最为关注的.

sentences.en: The economy appears to be uppermost in people's minds.
sentences.cn: 大家心里最关心的似乎是经济。

sentences.en: The rain spattered on the uppermost leaves.
sentences.cn: 雨溅落在最上面的树叶上。

sentences.en: The thought uppermost in his mind was the reiterated arguments of the morning.
sentences.cn: 他最先想到的还是早上那一番反复的争论.

sentences.en: the uppermost branches of the tree
Use its names for the uppermost classes.
sentences.cn: 将其名称用于最高级的类。

words.tran_cn: 至上的；最高的；最主要的
最高地；最重要地；最突出地

trans.tran_cn: 最高的，至上的，最重要的
